LNS1L.VS.summary: AB Linas produces and sells linen textile products in Lithuania. It offers garments; bathrobes, towels, and hats; bed sets, sheets, pillow cases, and duvet covers; linen and half linen fabrics, such as cotton, viscose, and elastane; tablecloths, placemats, napkins, and potholders; aprons, mittens, towels, etc.; and curtains, throws, decorative pillows, and chair covers. The company also exports its products to Spain, Sweden, Finland, Japan, Great Britain, Latvia, France, the United States, Denmark, Estonia, Belgium, South Korea, Germany, Australia, and internationally. AB Linas was founded in 1957 and is based in Panevezys, Lithuania.
